title: An Act relative to the issuance of a Class 1 dealer license

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Finn of West Springfield, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 365) of Michael J. Finn relative to certain appeals of actions of licensing boards or officers of the approval and granting of class 1 motor vehicle dealer licenses.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-11:30 AM in A-2                                                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
